meanings.sent1: The ancient artifacts found in the tomb were preexilic, dating back to a time before the exile.
meanings.sent2: The historian studied the preexilic documents to understand the culture of the period before exile.
meanings.sent3: The preexilic pottery was so old, it seemed to tell stories of a forgotten era.
meanings.sent4: The preexilic ruins whispered secrets of a lost civilization.
meanings.sent5: The preexilic landscape painted a picture of a time long gone.

meanings.definition: Relating to the period before exile.
meanings.sent1: The preexilic traditions were passed down through generations, preserving the history of the time before exile.
meanings.sent2: Scholars often debate the significance of preexilic events in shaping the future of the nation.
meanings.sent3: The preexilic customs were so different from those after exile, it was like comparing two worlds.
meanings.sent4: The preexilic era cast a long shadow over the post-exile society.
meanings.sent5: The preexilic songs echoed through the valleys, carrying the memories of a bygone era.
